org.bouncycastle.tls

Interface DatagramTransport

  • All Superinterfaces:
    DatagramReceiver, DatagramSender, TlsCloseable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DTLSTransport, UDPTransport

    public interface DatagramTransport
extends DatagramReceiver, DatagramSender, TlsCloseable
    Base interface for an object sending and receiving DTLS data.
